text: My mother and I were privileged to receive our first dose of the #Moderna #COVID19 #vaccine at my mother's #LTC home last week (I am her essential #caregiver). Feeling #thankful. #covidontario #CoronaVac #immunity #seniors #family #daughter #SandwichGeneration #JamGen @Moderna_tx https://t.co/ZnrdIMeXoO
